message.body: Hey!! I'm around Sunday try me then! Saturday is a long day!
Temple library wants to buy a copy!
cool!! great let's talk on sun. good luck with everything sounds like yr busy!
Busy but all going well I think! So far anyway
Did you start editing new movie?
that's great! haven't started, been editing book trailer but need to start!
Oh man how is it? Does it cut together??
it does!! I've worked on it a ton and sent them a "rough cut" altho it was so much farther than rough
the acting is good!
wait did you have your Carleton interview?
That's so awesome! Did you sync the sound?
I had it a week ago! Last week was crazy with shooting and interview
yeah synced sound, used VO we recorded outside on main shoot day for outdoor bar scene.
how was it??
I'm syncing now and exporting all these pro res files for the editor. I'm doing all the work haha
I think it went well bit I think most things go well because I'm delusional
It felt natural and they asked great questions. Knowing laksa helped a lot
She asked questions about senior projects and our film that only someone who knows me could ask
So that was great
if it felt natural that's a good sign! I doubt only you felt that. when do they decide? I wish someone would do all that editi prep for me!
I have to sync the sound for this new film. do you use plural eyes?
wow next week! I've been syncing all my sound the old fashioned way

I'm only doing it because my rate is less than the editors. Haha. I downloaded a free trial of FCPX just for this. Worked great!!! I think they interviewed a lot of people cause they were on a tight schedule. Will tell me by next week supposedly.
Don't! FCPX is like instant!
and you can't do that in premiere? didn't really want to have fcpx at all - you can do it with just the trial?
I actually haven't synced a lot of the adam sound yet so could try it
You just have to find the coordinating files which can be tricky if you don't slate
And hit one button.
Magic
I haven't tried yet with premiere because I only have cs5 at home.
The trial works great for 30 days
I was worried about a water mark but I don't see one
so you synced it all and then exported it?
Yeah. The editor asked for pro res LT files
It doesn't batch export clips as far as I can tell but it does background exporting so I have to set each clip up and then I just check on it every half hour
hmm. well adam doesn't have that much sync sound. i don't think I can do it for new film, so much footage. and he already exported proxy files for me from davinci
Nice!
It's so much work
yeah but the sound isn't synced!
Ugh.
You need an intern
I know premiere cc can do it but I have cs6. I do!
I just synced the audio for adam that was used in the rough cut which I think was better than syncing it all. but not sure what to do about new film
omg there's no scratch audio and the separate audio files aren't labeled!! sorry to keep texting you about this
No audio on the camera files?!? Ohhh noooo.
